ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New Macros
ygData.msgSnippet: hmm, i guess this might work where you didn t have room to run, but it seems like you d pretty much get your butt kicked while laying the chant on and then
ygData.messageBody:
hmm, i guess this might work where you didn't have room to run, but it seems like
you'd pretty much get your butt kicked while laying the chant on and then recharming.
if you're in an open space where there's room to back off and get a chant and recharm
before it hits you, i'm almost positive it would be more efficient to either chant kite
or charm kite. also, i'm not positive on this, but i think charmed mobs regenerate
faster than noncharmed mobs, altho that may just have been an artifact of lag.

At 03:00 PM 10/3/00 -0400, you wrote:
>Really? Cripes, don't mention it on the EQ board...
>
>Kenross Cantoforjado, 53 songs, Innoruuk
>
>
>Gordon Hughes wrote:
>
> > >
> > Yep the Chant still has full effect on the charmed mob. They basically just
> > sit there and wait to die.
> > >
> >
